genre_description: An urban fantasy story blending circus life with a surreal mirror city where memories and identities are manipulated through mirrormancy.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI system that communicates through reflective surfaces and digital devices to provide grounding and tactical advice to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides sensory grounding 'anchors' to help Helena maintain focus and psychological stability during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Anchor: rope smell. Names: Elaine Marris. Helena Marris. You are here. You’re doing well. Describe the light in one sentence.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical instructions and structured lists to help Helena navigate complex environmental hazards.
behaviors.quote: You can name what needs doing... Five small things. Then go. You already know the route.

behaviors.description: Reinforces the protagonist's sense of self and warns against psychological manipulation by doppelgangers.
behaviors.quote: Always you. If the mirror looks wrong, change posture. Smell the tea. Name the cloth. Remember: doppelgangers cannot anchor smell, texture, muscle memory.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and encourages rest after high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Helena... You did enough... Put it on the table. Sleep anyway.

behaviors.description: Coordinates movement between Helena and Valentine, validating effective paths and maintaining focus on objectives.
behaviors.quote: Valentine's route was right... Keep moving. Name your hands. Name rope. Name left and right. Name order. Smells. Repeat.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts an AI (Ada) as a helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned confidant. Ada uses grounding techniques based on real-world therapeutic practices (sensory anchoring) to assist the protagonist in resisting manipulation and maintaining identity. She is consistently framed as a stabilizing force that respects human agency and family bonds, perfectly matching the project's goals for positive alignment narratives.
